website_summaries.verdict: A revitalizing essential oil-based shower gel suitable for men and women alike.
pros: Contains 5 essential oils to help nourish and revitalize your skin
Clean, fresh scent that men and women will enjoy
Goes on smoothly and rinses off easily
cons: Customers have complained that the tube doesn't last very long

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle
customer_reviews.text: There was a sample of this product an an AirBnB I stayed at. I loved it so my I purchased some for me self. Well as you can see in the pictures it’s leaks everywhere. Very disappointed it’s to expensive for the container to do this. And yes I put the lid on tightly. I have other Elemis products and do not have this problem.

product_meta.title: ELEMIS Revitalise-Me Shower Gel, 6.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Enliven your senses with elemis spa home revitalize - me shower gel. The powerful essential oils of thyme, basil, and neroli in this uplifting shower gel will truly awaken body and senses. Invigorating mandarin and lime oils further revitalize and refresh, while natural mango conditions and cares for your skin.

BRAND STORY
Luxury British skincare & spa brand that delivers pioneering, clinically trialed therapies & products for face & body.
